ac58edec-9a9d-43c7-8736-7ac24daf6cdc:
Choose one type of weapon (including {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strike) for which you possess the Weapon Specialization {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with the chosen weapon are more devastating than normal.
Benefit: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} you make using the selected weapon. This bonus to damage stacks with other damage roll bonuses, including any you gain from Weapon Specialization.
Special: You can gain Greater Weapon Specialization multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new type of weapon.
44462656-ff6b-4a02-84b4-278b082f035b: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} you make using hoofs.
9e65e9bf-28f4-4c7b-a7ad-b752ae246385: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} you make using large bastard swords.
21a19c0b-5378-4362-851a-68c7b57da327: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} you make using longswords.
7ce42cfc-fe24-4fb9-b679-f32f8bda79c1: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} you make using shortswords.
9f8b8a2a-a3e3-4a4a-aca2-f488d833c469: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} you make using sting {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
